recipesJson.name: Tobacco simple
recipesJson.author: nks
recipesJson.description: simple tobacco taste,cigarette like but not that ashy.shade provides a slightly sweet aftertaste,but that's all.no vanillas,no creams; simply tobacco.inspired by this recipe on elr  http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/1244942/Old%20Habits which is really heavy and ashy
